website_summaries.verdict: These life-like flameless candles come in a set of 6, making it easy to spread them out or use in different rooms.
pros: Set of 6 candles eliminates the need to buy extras
Features a real wax exterior, flickering flames, and an uneven melted design
Comes with a remote control and offers multiple dimmer and timer settings
Warm LED lights produce a cozy ambience
cons: Some owners felt the light color was a bit too warm
May melt if left in the sun

customer_reviews.title: Question the quality
customer_reviews.text: Modifying my initial review - Originally, two of the candles did not work out of the box and I had started the return process. I was bummed because the other 4 worked perfectly and I hate returning things. The seller contacted me and told me to keep the 4 and that they would send me a whole box of the next size down. I received those and am really pleasantly surprised and happy with how it all turned out. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: TMO

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous value on these! Exactly what I was looking for instead of using candles up on the wall, I just put up 2 new sconces. I really like the timer, they consecutively come on each time at the same time of the day and turn off 4 hours, 6 hours, or 8 hours whichever you choose. I would purchase these again in a heartbeat! And let me tell you if you shopped a local craft stores in the area, the value price for these is astounding!!
customer_reviews.author: pinkcovered

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my Christmas decor.
customer_reviews.text: These candles worked great and looked great over Christmas! I loved all the different timer options and left them to turn off and on all on their own. Someone commented that they were not white and although they are not bright white, they are not yellow and are a good shade of off white. I highly recommend as they price was really good for 3 candles.
customer_reviews.author: DiscountDiva

customer_reviews.title: Look Very Real
customer_reviews.text: They look great and with the ability to adjust brightness and flicker they look very real. Still trying to figure out exactly how the remote works.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Duthie

customer_reviews.title: 2019 MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of flameless candles and this set does NOT disappoint! Loving the remote
customer_reviews.author: Wil Sweatt

customer_reviews.title: Nice LED candle set - remote has many features
customer_reviews.text: I like this LED candle set because the 6 candles are large, and covered in wax. The flicker is realistic, and the remote has a timer as well as flicker/solid feature. These candles do not include AA batteries which is ok because they would be super cheap free batteries anyway. Also these are packed very well in foam to prevent damage in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: The candles are great.
customer_reviews.text: They are very romantic. I am ordering some more for my bedroom. I sat four on my mantel over my fireplace and I placed the other 2 on my coffee table. I love them, but I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Thomas-Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Dorm safe
customer_reviews.text: These candles are exactly what my daughter wanted for her dorm room. Very realistic!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Foster Jr.

customer_reviews.title: awesome candles
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Beautiful soft light and so great that you can turn off and on with a remote. BUY THEM! you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are so much better than I expected. The remote allows you to brighten or dim each flame so they look even more real.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Z

customer_reviews.title: Cozy lighting
customer_reviews.text: We just got these and so far really like them. They have a waxy feel and lots of options - flickering or constant, bright or dim.
customer_reviews.author: Lindell

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These candles are a great addition to my home. I have them in my sconces and lanterns, and on my mantle. Each candle uses two AA batteries (not included). The remote and timer features work great. My candles come on and turn off automatically right on time every night. You can also select a solid light or flickering light, and you can increase or decrease the brightness. I am very happy with these - they are designed to look and feel like real candles, and they really enhance the "coziness" of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Tanis Varney

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: they are a little tall for a standard candle holder so you might want some that are 3x3 or 3x4, but they look great and work great. I love that they are waxy and I love the control feature. it makes it so easy to turn on and off. Its a very orangy-yellow light. I probably would have preferred a more natural looking colored light, but for the price you cant beat it and it still looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful candles!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles! I just returned a set because the 'flame' actually came out of a hole in the candle and it looked tacky. These are lovely. What a pleasure to just hit the remote to shut them down! So fun. They have a beautiful soft glow to them. I'm going to order a second set for the entire patio!
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The candles arrived and work exactly as shown. Love the wax exterior! We have a metal wall decor that uses candles, it came with real candles but we were afraid to light them so close to the wall...better safe than sorry. With these flameless candles we can light our dining room art and feel 100% safe. Bonus, when the light go out during a storm, hit the remote and we're good to go! The packaging....awesome!!!! They arrived all nestled in made to order foam, we were blown away with the care taken to ship this product. I will be purchasing these again!!
customer_reviews.author: chris moore

customer_reviews.title: Safer than candles during power failure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace candles at our Lakehouse...easy to turn them on with click and point. I also feel safer with these to use in times of power failure. I have bought more to have in our home...
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY at a GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! I was looking for some flameless ivory candles, all the same size, that I could customize with ribbon and these are perfect! I love the fact that each one requires only 2 AA batteries and that they operate on a remote that can be set to turn after 2, 4, 6, or 8 hours. The remote also has a candle mode (flickering) or light mode (steady) as well as a dimmer option.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We loved these candle lights initially. However, individual lights kept requiring new batteries. At least we thought. In reality, the new batteries would last a day, or hour, or minute. It has been a constant struggle to keep them all working. Currently only 2 of 6 work. They appear to have issues shorting out and replacing the batteries appear to work for a minute, and then they short out again. They may also stop working if they get bumped even slightly. They look good, but don't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly defective
customer_reviews.text: 2 out six of the candles that arrived have a slight defect on them. One has a wrong battery plate (it’s pointed and scratches the battery) while the other one continually flickers even when set in regular light only. I wish I can return them but it all came in a set and it’s a pain to return it all. Have yet to test how long this will last. For now, I already have a bad impression.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected or ordered
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the 3 different size set of these candles and they had the very realistic "flickering" flame at the top (actually a plastic piece that moves and reflects light). Since these were in the same ad, and had the same description on the website, I assumed they were the same. They are not....the light is a solid light about 1/2 down the height of the candle, does not flicker. I am SO disappointed -- I love the other set and these are just not the same. I don't know if I was sent the wrong product or if they were simply advertised incorrectly, but I will be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: M. OConnell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these - perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4 types of flameless candles in the last few years, and these are by far my favorite. The light color is realistic (not too yellow, not too white), the "flame" (bulb) is placed low enough inside the candle that you can use it in a variety of places without noticing it's not real (don't have to put it up high), the flicker is realistic, and the wax, uneven top looks realistic. It's also fairly bright. I am ordering 2 more sets as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: StudentReader

customer_reviews.title: Not great value
customer_reviews.text: The product info and photos are not entirely accurate- the candles are more white than ivory and the light they emit is definitely a cooler tone than an actual candle would be. I was hoping for a warmer tone light. My box of 6 candles included 2 that don’t work properly. The lights turn on, but are VERY dim. The remote and available functions are nice and the candles themselves look good, but overall not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: 5Ekids

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are amazing! I love the timer feature, because I can turn them on while getting ready for bed and not worry about turning them off if I fall asleep.. they do it themselves. I also love that it has a “light” and “candle” setting.. so you can choose if you want the light to stay on, or flicker like a real candle.. but the best part is that the light can be dimmer or brightened! I’ve never had battery candles like these that have that function. They work awesome and my whole house loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Mamatobees

customer_reviews.title: Create that spa like setting right at home
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so i could feel cozy in the house on afternoons with jazz and tea. so worth it! the remote works like a dream and these flicker warmly without much distraction. the dimming feature is a mega bonus too. My mom even made me buy her a seperate set because i wouldn't giver her mine. each candle uses 2 double AA battery and has a wax like feel when held. Smells a bit like a crayon though when out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Get ‘em
customer_reviews.text: I guess it’s the simple things. These candles are so fantastic. They give off the perfect brightness and ambiance throughout the home. The remote control and timer function are above and beyond. These would be great for an occasion, but they are perfect to just place around your home, do a quick walk through with your remote as the sun sets, and set the vibe. I also have a mischievous cat. I missed having candles in the house. Solves that problem too 😻
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Candles work fine except for one. Will have to reset again. I’ve had these for 2 weeks, now all of them are dead. New Duracell batteries were used for 6 hrs run time each night. Would not recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Casey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and bright
customer_reviews.text: These candles are very realistic, beautiful and bright. They've been outside through the autumn and now the hoidays and they look amazing. I have them in lanterns. The only drawback is the remote control. It was indicated that the remote turns the ALL on seemingly at the same time. Noooo, you have to go to each candle and turn them on which means that I have to go outside and up to each lantern each time that I want them on. Bummer in the rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Mac's Books

customer_reviews.title: Remote control provides amazing # of combinations for timer/light functions
customer_reviews.text: Love the remote: it has four different timer periods (2,4,6 or 8 hrs) ; it has option of candle or light mode; it allows the led light to be dimmed or brightened -allowing for very individualized settings. Prefer the warm, golden flickering glow emitted when in ""candle" mode.The light does not flicker In "light" mode. Dimming probably conserves battery life, but I prefer the brightest function.The height & diameter (5" X 3") is ideal for the spaces I've placed these candles & the price beat anything I found locally for 2-3 candles with simple on/off switch or 1 timer function. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: M Brown

customer_reviews.title: safty first.
customer_reviews.text: Not completely realistic when you are up close but so much safer Than real candles. Where I live the power goes out a lot. I bought a battery indoor out door chandelier but the candles that came with it (also battery) were very fake looking. These candle when in the fixture look very real. The remote works great and these candles put out a bit more light. Now I just push the button and get enough light so I do not trip over the dogs and cats . I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, realistic looking led candles!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these candles after searching for over a month for a realistic looking led candle to use in my wedding center pieces. I’m using lanterns with a floral wreath and wanted to use candles inside the lanterns but tried a real candle for just a minute and realized immediately that it would not be feasible as the lantern became extremely hot. These led candles are affordable and look very realistic. I bought the 6 pack and will need to purchase more to complete all of my center pieces but just wanted to try them out first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: While I like the look of these candles I was disappointed that I have to be right next to them in order to use the remote. I have to find just the right spot on the candles to turn them on or off. I have 3 of them in a centerpiece with some ivy and the remote won't even work, I have to pick them up instead. They're okay if you don't care too much about the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Rose S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the first battery candles I've ever purchased so I'm not able to compare them to any others. However, I am satisfied with the quality and they are satisfactorily realistic. My only complaint is with the instructions for the remote control, or rather the lack of instructions. The pamphlet labeled each of the buttons, but the steps needed to operate and set the options was not obvious and I'm still playing around with them to try to figure out how to set the timers and even how to simply turn them off and on, especially when operating more than one candle.
customer_reviews.author: Laraine

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your patio!
customer_reviews.text: I put two of the candles on wrought-iron sconces on my covered back patio. The other is in a glass hanging jar. They give off great ambient light for small gatherings. Not enough light to read by, but perfect for a quiet evening enjoying the outdoors. I'll probably buy another set or two for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M. Fye

customer_reviews.title: The colors are different!
customer_reviews.text: None of the light from these is consistent. Some have a warm yellow glow like a real flame. Others look almost pink. Extremely frustrating. I’ve been through two different orders now and still not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful candles!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of a candle lit room . . . but the real thing can be dangerous and a lot of work. I have 2 sets of these candles scattered around my bedroom and I just love the realistic glow these give off. I use these to help relax and set a peaceful atmosphere at bed time. Love the remote control and the personalizing adjustments that can be made.
customer_reviews.author: Tie Dye

customer_reviews.title: difficulty opening remote
customer_reviews.text: One star off due to difficulty opening the remote. There is a tiny tab at the bottom should be pushed sideways towards the battery tray. Hope this helps anyone who has had problems with replacing the remote's battery.
customer_reviews.author: Pastells

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Flameless Candlelight
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile product. Remote control and cycling timer are great. I can set and forget. Love that they are all the same height, but would prefer a slimmer candle...would have liked to use in windows this year, but the 3" width is a bit wide for my window sills with current window treatments. So, they will be used for tablescapes, sconces, bedroom/bathroom ambiance, etc. Since they are real wax, they have a very nice feel and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: MARIDEE.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these to go in my Airbnb, I didn’t want a candle with flame in a rental. I wanted something easy where I wouldn’t have to worry about turning off a switch like I have in another rental. Oh my goodness I love these! You can point at an indione and turn it on or the group and turn them on/ off. I had a guest review that they loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Seavbeach

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and so far works well. Only been a day so I can’t speak to battery life. Love the flickering and they look great in the lanterns on my front steps :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Loehmer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received these candles so I cannot address the versatility, durability or battery life issues to this point. However, the candles were packed well and arrived in pristine condition. The remote control is very convenient although I have only used the on/off part of the device at this time. The candles look quite nice and I’m pleased with the purchase - and you couldn’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking candles
customer_reviews.text: I really like these candles. The remote works well (I did find that at farther distances, the candles work better if you orient them so the on off switch is toward the front. I think the brightness is good and similar to a real candle. They look nice. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Slashlilystar

customer_reviews.title: Best remote controlled candle I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest remote controlled lights I have every purchased. The candles come with a remote that gives you the ability to turn them on and off, control brightness, control flicker, and control the timer of the candle. I used them inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They look like there is a real flame and they are a perfect size. The remote is an extra bonus. I wish they only used 1 AA battery instead of 2, but if they last a long time then it's not a big deal. I would defend recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: They work, what more can you ask?
customer_reviews.text: These work just fine and are exactly what I was looking for. The flicker setting is realistic enough, remote and timer work just fine. I admit, I was worried about the quality but they are no different than sets I've found in big box stores that cost significantly more. Can't comment on longevity as I just got them. The soft foam packaging they came in will be perfect for storing them safely when I'm not using them. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Poison girl

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Item and just ordered another set. They change the mood of your home. The lights have flicker option which allows you to enjoy the same calming effect of a real candle without all the fuss with Wax dripping. I love this Product.
customer_reviews.author: sabinacabo

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but they melt
customer_reviews.text: My fault, I left them in our enclosed patio. Thought the heat wouldn’t hurt them, no direct sun light. WRONG! Melted. Still repurchasing because they look great. Just don’t leave them in a warm location. Store them inside. 😬
customer_reviews.author: Sharky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These were not the same ones I had ordered. I like the ones where the wick is above and flickers. But, these are great, too. The light is what flickers giving the appearance of flame. Just a matter of preference. Either is great and everyone I’ve given a set to absolutely loves them. This is the best brand, also. Tried others and they were inferior.
customer_reviews.author: Rocki

customer_reviews.title: Remote stopped working after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Remote stopped working after one use and it wasn’t a battery issues. Not happy. I’d like a replacement remote please.
customer_reviews.author: MarLashes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love the remote! So simple to turn them on and set the time with a remote so I dont have to pick them up to dlip the on switch each time and I sont have to worry about forgetting to turn them off before bed. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: 5/6 Actually Work
customer_reviews.text: Received a pack of 6, but only 5 actually work the way they are meant to. One of the candles turns on immediately once batteries are inserted, even when in the "off" position. This candle also doesn't sync with the timer. The only way for it to be "off" is by taking the batteries out altogether. The other 5 work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These candles work really well. They are as described with several functions. They have good receiver that I am able to use a RF/IR blaster to control all 6 at once placed around my room. I would recommend these. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Too dim
customer_reviews.text: These candles are too dim to be useful. They barely put out any light, even when adjusted to maximum brightness. Remote control worked OK.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Candles
customer_reviews.text: I really like the candles but they don’t all work. Since I have had them I have changed the batteries at least 4 times. Two or three of them won’t even stay on. I am really disappointed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Chababi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glow
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these candles. The glow is warm and gently flickers. I needed 5 for a large sconce and these were perfect for that. Very good price. The remote offers many options too.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Wonders

customer_reviews.title: Adds beautiful ambience!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these candles!!! They look real and they feel real too!! The remote is such a nice touch!! We put them on every night and they just add such a nice peaceful glow to every evening! I bought a set for my sister and she loves them and uses every night too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paul Burton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful natural looking reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! These candles are Stunning! Love that is has different settings. Looks like a real candle. Happy I purchased these. I will probably be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Wax looks more yellow than white
customer_reviews.text: Candle wax looks more yellow than white/ivory. Also what stinks when I use my TV remote it controls the candles which is annoying. I'm not sure the odds of that
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: They’re good. You just have to point the remote at each individual candle to get it tow work. Would be kind of nice to have a way to turn them all on at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Brent_sd

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for 6!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and chose these based on their reviews. I can say they are beautiful, look realistic with the flicker setting, and turn on and off/timer with a remote which is so convenient. I haven’t had them long enough to comment on battery life but I am so pleased with how they look and operate.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great battery powered candles!
customer_reviews.text: I paint hurricane jars and love to put candles in them. Where I live, it can be too hot to burn candles all evening long. I especially like the ability to have these candles either flicker or have a steady light. The convenience of a remote is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinekid

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles so far. I've had them for about a week now and they are very nice. The flickering effect is very realistic and I love the remote. Makes it so easy to turn them all off or on at once. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Confusion
customer_reviews.text: I find it confusing to understand how to use remote! I need to call and talk to someone, for instance, do they have to be all together or at least very close to use remote. I just received them yesterday and hope to call today to talk to someone. I expected directions to be included, however, they are very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lights
customer_reviews.text: I think they are good lights. You can set timers for each light with the remote. The remote does not reach far and good for the price of the product. Can set candles to regular light or give them a flame affect, which is a nice mood setting. Good for home and I also take them camping for in tent light.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Fancy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Iffy performance
customer_reviews.text: The remote is delicate and started dying right away although it was not heavily used.. It worked now and again but not with certainty, and now with a new battery—again— it just won't work. And not all the candles respond predictably. The product idea, and look, are fine. This seems to be a manufacturer quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Just like real candles without the melting wax
customer_reviews.text: These look great and give off quite a bit of light. The flickering is very realistic as well. I put them in lanterns on my back patio on the ground and they withstood torrential rain no problem. I'm very pleased with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ford

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the timer and remote. Candles are beautiful and very realistic. Very realistic soft light. I will buy more for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: remote and remote features are the best!!!  Loveall these remote candles!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these remote control candles. Have purchased several sets that I use around my house. Also purchased 2 sets of remote tealights that I use in tealight fireplace faux log. 🥰🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Do not work as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Candles will turn on automatically for a day or two, then they consistently need to be reset. Completely defeats the purpose of having timer setting etc.
customer_reviews.author: Makaveli

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job to make the home feel relaxing and amazing romantic vibe. I suggest getting a candle holder for decorum and to style the space correctly. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Grant

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these flameless candles, I got them at the beginning of November and used them every night for at least two hours. The batteries lasted the whole time, they are still lighting up only not as bright... I will remove the batteries before I pack it up for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Deso

customer_reviews.title: THESE CANDLES DO NOT WORK! JUNK PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: None of the candles work. Loaded all candles with batteries and also troubleshooted with remote. Still none of the candles lit up !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless remote
customer_reviews.text: The candles work great and look very nice. But the remote that came with them didn’t work, I even tried replacing the battery but it didn’t work. I’m super disappointed, the main reason I bought these was because they could be remote operated.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Candlelight ambiance
customer_reviews.text: These are great for worry-free ambiance. The flickering light seems pretty realistic. I like that you can set a timer for auto-off to save batteries in case you forget to turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: Waoac

customer_reviews.title: Buy them ! Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Great price on these! Have been using for a week now and they work well. Kids like turning them on and off each evening. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper's mom

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic and don't disappear - just replace the batteries every once in a while. The only "con" can't be set for a certain time to go on and off - which I prefer; but these will do.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kamm

customer_reviews.title: 🙄🙄🙄😍💆👏
customer_reviews.text: Lovely idea for above fire place and adding a good ambience for any occasion! The remote has a candle mode or light light mode. I am currently using the candle mode as i bathe and toss a bath bomb in for a relaxing evening during this quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie vidrio

customer_reviews.title: These are sooo real!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order & they look & feel very real. Not like the ones with the wiggley flames that look like the fake flames they are. All my friends are getting some version of these for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: D Duigou

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now purchased these 2x. They are great. They gave a wax outside ( protected by plastic if you want to take off)... and they flicker in a realistic way. The remote is great; but really, I just gave it on an automatic that it starts at 6 pm and it goes off 6 hours later. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: SMacdonald

customer_reviews.title: Candle atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: I put the candles in my fireplace. Great look and atmosphere. I get comments all the time. The best thing is the remote, I don't have to turn them on and off individually. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. There might be a slight difference in colors among the 6 (I think another review mentioned that), but overall they are less orange / fakey looking then ones I’ve bought locally. I really like how they flicker - looks super-real. Great price! Haven’t tried the remote control yet.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take camping and they are exactly what I was hoping for! They have a pretty realistic look and feel, and the remote with auto-off timer options is super convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Avoid delivery in the heat
customer_reviews.text: The candles seem to be of good quality. However, in the heat of delivery they became warped. They will be fine for my fireplace decor but be warned, heat will warp them.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S Stricklin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome candles at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: The price for these candles is awesome for the quality. The brightness is better than any other flameless candle I've purchased, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. I purchased these for a Christmas craft for my students and they were perfect. I definitely recommend this product and would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Question the quality
customer_reviews.text: Modifying my initial review - Originally, two of the candles did not work out of the box and I had started the return process. I was bummed because the other 4 worked perfectly and I hate returning things. The seller contacted me and told me to keep the 4 and that they would send me a whole box of the next size down. I received those and am really pleasantly surprised and happy with how it all turned out. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Julius

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted with these candles! They look so nice in our walk sconces! The problem is that the remote just suddenly stopped working after only a couple of uses. A new battery didn’t solve the problem! A replacement set was sent out immediately & I can’t be more pleased with the product or the seller!
customer_reviews.author: E. Horan

customer_reviews.title: So far great
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Still on first batteries & have set to come on same time every night for 6 hours. If they sold one with 4" diameter this old woman would do happy dance
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of them! Definitely not the brightest but they are used for decoration so I don't mind. The timer works perfectly too :)
customer_reviews.author: Chiii

customer_reviews.title: Flameless Candles Battery Operated with remote
customer_reviews.text: Awesome- set them up outside in a covered (water safe) lantern and so easy- set up controls and they come on and off when I want them too! Love these- don't leave out in high heat as they are real wax and will melt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Flameless Candle Set!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! Looks so pretty with my octopus candle holder. What I love about the candles, is that they are all the same size. Great quality & price!
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Nice uniform candles
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my mom. Oddly enough it is hard to find remote control candles that are all the same size. Happy to have found these and they were nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Elena Whitetree

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles for Outdoor Dining - No bugs!!
customer_reviews.text: We have always used real candles in a glass hurricane holder for outdoor dining but were getting annoyed by the bugs that they were attracting. The LED lights eliminate the bugs and the flame and flicker are very realistic for a die hard candle lover. The remote is really convenient, as well. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: MBM

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement remote!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking candles that provide a pleasant decorative glow. I promptly misplaced the remote, and can’t find a way to purchase a replacement, which is the only reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purhase
customer_reviews.text: Look great and the batteries last well. We’ve had them on the daily 6 hour timer for a couple of weeks and the rechargeable batteries we put in them are still going. The candles all use the same remote but can be set individually.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K.

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: All of my units were functional and they work perfectly. I can tell that they are cheaply made with their wobbly battery connectors, but so far so good. The timed auto shut off feature is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great value, nice ambient glow, realistic flicker. Sadly one of the six candles did not work. I did not want to send all of them back at my expense, for one faulty candle. Everything is also a bit more complicated with "shelter in place" with Covid 19. I would buy again, and hope all 6 candles would work.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W Hammerbeck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles.
customer_reviews.text: Love these frameless candles. The remote is nice to have too. You can adjust them to glow like a flickering candle or set to a steady glow and also adjust the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: WLG

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These worked well and looked nice. Not sure how the wax surface will hold up in the garage, though. Keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Realistic flameless candle
customer_reviews.text: Realistic looking candle and the timer is easy to set with the remote. I really like them and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tlrider

customer_reviews.title: Love these Lights🥰
customer_reviews.text: I love these light! They arrived in perfect condition!!! They look like real wax candles and the timer and the remote function work perfectly!! Very pleased with the lights!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft candle light, although my batteries ran out in 2 days because i did not set the timer. The nicest feature is that the candles do not break if they are dropped orfall off table, perfect for pet owners and small children who like to play with table top things
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Deschenes

product_meta.title: Flameless Candles Battery Operated Pillar Real Wax Flickering Electric LED Candle Gift Sets with Remote Control Cycling 24 Hours Timer by Aku Tonpa, 3"x5" Pack of 6
product_meta.description:
Color:#1, Ivory Wax, 6 Pack, 3" X 5"Package Included
- 6 x LED Candles (Size: D 3" x H 5")
- 1 x Remote Control
- 1 x User Manual

Real Flame-effect Candles
These candles are so realistic that practically indistinguishable from traditional burning candles.
Flame simulation technology makes the candles flash, brings the most realistic experience to any room.

Real Wax & Elegant Design
The candle shell is made from paraffin wax, however there is no burning wick, smoke or messy dripping wax. They are perfect for places like bookshelves and bedrooms.
Smooth finish, classic ivory color and elegant design, use the Real Flame-effect Candles in locations where you would use real candles.

How to illuminating the Candle
Move the OFF-ON switch on the bottom to ON. The candle will illuminate until you manually move the switch to OFF.
ON-OFF button: Illuminating the Candle On=Off (Note:Before you use the Remote Control, switch the ON-OFF button to ON at the bottom of the LED candles).
TIMER: set On/Off Automatic Time feature, set to 2Hours/4Hours/6Hours/8Hours. 
Mode: Candle-Flickering Lights; Light-Non-Flickering Lights.
Brightness Control: Left button to lower the brightness Right button to increase brightness.

More Tips:
1. This candle is made of real wax and is flammable. Do not attempt to light this candle.
2. Keep out of direct sunlight, away from heat sources and out of extreme temperatures or your candle may soften or melt.
3. Constant use of the timer however may considerably reduce battery life.
feature_bullets: Incredibly realistic flame LED Candle, flame simulation technology makes the candles sway and flash so convincingly. Light is created by LED, safe to use around children and pets, LED candles without real fire, never worry about fire-related accidents again.
With one remote control, You could control all our candles.
10-key remote timer, once the timer is set, the candle comes on at the same time each day and stays on for either 2 hours/4 hours/6 hours/8 hours.
Powered by 2 AA batteries (Not included) per candle, the expected battery life is of approx 200 hours (high-grade battery required). The lifetime of LED Lamp is 50,000 hours.
These decorative candles can be widely applied to birthday, Christmas, home decorations, bars, hotel, parties, holidays, wedding, or other occasions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,032 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
